sentences.sentence: The rafts made me think of the story Huckle Berry Finn and his adventures down the American Mississippi river.
sentences.translation: 这让我想起了马克吐温小说里哈克贝利。弗恩沿密西西比河而下的冒险之旅。

sentences.sentence: One not careful huckle grew a flowing muscle tumour, had finished now operation, also did put cure, just do not understand all the time how chairman this thing?
sentences.translation: 一不小心大腿部长了个平滑肌肉瘤，现在已经做完手术，也做了放疗，只是一直不明白怎么会长这个东西呢?。
